title: TASS Execution File
description: A TASS job file, to be executed using the TASS framework.

Job.description: Description of the job. Sets default values for undefined test case values.

title.description: Name of the job. Defaults to the file name.

build.description: Build of the application being tested. Inherited by test cases if not specified.

parent.description: Description of the parent job if generated from converter.

path.description: File path of the parent document at the time of conversion.

Tests.description: List of Test cases with configurations that may be executed.

Cases.description: List of Test cases that may be executed.

Steps.description: List of steps, singular actions, that can be executed in a test case.

Browsers.description: Browser configurations to be used in this test run.

Meta.description: Additional information about this test run that does not affect the test.

results-path.description: File path to write results. Overwrites default.

pages-path.description: File path to read POM files from.

uuid.$comment: Created as a definition for possible future functionality. Validating uuids.

test.description: Test to be executed. Includes which case and any other configuration settings.

uuid.description: The uuid of this test. Typically a compounded uuid of the job, case, and configuration uuids.

case.description: The uuid of the case that will be executed.

configuration.description: Contains the various configurations for running a case.

browser.description: The uuid of the browser used in this configuration.

case.description: Describes a singular test case. Test cases should be independant of one another.

title.description: Human readable descriptor for the test case.

build.description: Version of the application being tested.

step.description: Describes a singular step, a single action to be takenby the automation.

title.description: Human readable descriptor for the step.

action.$comment: TODO: Create external step schema to further validate steps for each action/parameters.
action.description: An array with a length of 2, the first string states the module, the second the action.

parameters.description: Parameters content is dependant on the action used.

browser_name.description: The name of the browser to be used.

driver.description: Configuration values for the automated driver.

arguments.description: Flags to be passed to the browser instance

preferences.description: Key value pairs to set preferences of a browser.
